name: Mark Platten
what_you_do: Mark J. Platten is a transformational educator and generations expert who helps individuals and organizations navigate midlife, embody purpose, and create impactful legacies through various programs and initiatives.
who_you_serve: He serves leaders, teams, and individuals, particularly men aged 40-60, as well as business owners and supervisors facing generational workforce challenges.
signature_programs: The King's Return, Generations in the Workforce, The Art of Connecting With Nature
company: The Soul Tank, Integral Human Initiative
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: Leading transformational men's programs and generational workforce consulting.
bio: 30 years of experience, MBA in Organizational Management, author of a book on nature connection.
business_focus: Mark J. Platten is a transformational educator and generations expert who helps individuals and organizations navigate midlife, embody purpose, and create impactful legacies through various programs and initiatives. (transformational education)
